item.title: Famitsu Sales: 11/4/24 – 11/10/24
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2024/11/famitsu-sales-11-4-24-11-10-24

  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

Mario & Luigi: Brothership and PlayStation 5 Pro debut.

Famitsu has published its estimated physical game software data for Japan for the week of November 4, 2024 to November 10, 2024.

Mario & Luigi: Brothership for Switch was the highest selling new game release of the week, opening at 63,441 retail copies sold.

PlayStation 5 Pro also debuted with launch week sales of 78,086 units.

On the hardware side, the PlayStation 5 family sold 95,160 units, the Switch family sold 63,012 units, the Xbox Series family sold 2,405 units, and the PlayStation 4 family sold 49 units.

Get the full sales charts below.

Software Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. [NSW] Mario & Luigi: Brothership (Nintendo, 11/07/24) – 63,441 (New)
  2. [NSW] Super Mario Party Jamboree (Nintendo, 10/17/24) – 43,347 (409,831)
  3. [NSW] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) – 6,729 (91,742)
  4. [NSW] Mario Kart 8 Deluxe (Nintendo, 04/28/17) – 6,245 (6,050,284)
  5. [NSW] Battle Spirits CrossOver (FuRyu, 11/07/24) – 5,355 (New)
  6. [NSW] Minecraft (Microsoft, 06/21/18) – 5,230 (3,671,568)
  7. [NSW] Animal Crossing: New Horizons (Nintendo, 03/20/20) – 5,015 (7,948,548)
  8. [NSW] The Legend of Zelda: Echoes of Wisdom (Nintendo, 09/26/24) – 4,907 (299,278)
  9. [PS5] Slitterhead (Bokeh Game Studio, 11/08/24) – 4,697 (New)
  10. [NSW] Nintendo Switch Sports (Nintendo, 04/29/22) – 4,472 (1,457,553)

Rankings 11 to 30 will be announced on November 15.

  1. [PS5] Dead Rising Deluxe Remaster (Capcom, 11/08/24) – (New)
  2. [PS5] Battle Spirits CrossOver (FuRyu, 11/07/24) – (New)
  3. [PS5] Taiko no Tatsujin: Rhythm Festival (Bandai Namco, 11/07/24) – (New)
  4. [PS4] River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next (Arc System Works, 11/07/24) – (New)
  5. [NSW] River City Saga: Three Kingdoms Next (Arc System Works, 11/07/24) – (New)
  6. [PS5] Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Activision, 10/25/24) –
  7. [PS5] Professional Baseball Spirits 2024-2025 (Konami, 10/17/24) –
  8. [PS5] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  9. [NSW] Farmagia (Marvelous, 11/01/24) –
  10. [PS5] Dragon Age: The Veilguard (Electronic Arts, 10/31/24) –
  11. [NSW] Clock Tower: Rewind (SUNSOFT, 10/31/24) –
  12. [NSW] Powerful Pro Baseball 2024-2025 (Konami, 07/18/24) –
  13. [PS5] Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO (Bandai Namco, 10/11/24) –
  14. [NSW] Romance of the Three Kingdoms 8 Remake (Koei Tecmo Games, 10/24/24) –
  15. [PS5] Metaphor: ReFantazio (ATLUS, 10/11/24) –
  16. [PS4] Romancing SaGa 2: Revenge of the Seven (Square Enix, 10/24/24) –
  17. [NSW] Pokemon Scarlet / Pokemon Violet (The Pokemon Company, 11/18/22) –
  18. [PS4] Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 (Activision, 10/25/24) –
  19. [PS5] Life is Strange: Double Exposure (Square Enix, 10/29/24) –
  20. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu World: Chikyuu wa Kibou de Mawatteru! (Konami, 11/16/23) –
  21. [NSW] Luigi’s Mansion 3 (Nintendo, 10/31/19) –
  22. [NSW] Sonic X Shadow Generations (SEGA, 10/25/24) –
  23. [NSW] Super Mario Bros. Wonder (Nintendo, 10/20/23) –
  24. [NSW] The Quintessential Quintuplets: Gotopazu Story 2nd (MAGES., 10/31/24) –
  25. [NSW] Clubhouse Games: 51 Worldwide Classics (Nintendo, 06/05/20) –
  26. [NSW] Momotaro Dentetsu: Showa, Heisei, Reiwa mo Teiban! (Konami, 11/19/20) –
  27. [NSW] EA Sports FC 25 (Electronic Arts, 09/27/24) –

Hardware Sales (followed by lifetime sales)

  1. PlayStation 5 Pro – 78,086 (78,086)
  2. Switch OLED Model – 42,297 (8,174,441)
  3. Switch Lite – 16,140 (6,199,385)
  4. PlayStation 5 – 8,571 (5,262,559)
  5. Switch – 5,575 (19,938,430)
  6. Xbox Series X Digital Edition – 1,505 (6,641)
  7. PlayStation 5 Digital Edition – 1,503 (867,237)
  8. Xbox Series S – 668 (323,078)
  9. Xbox Series X – 232 (308,450)
  10. PlayStation 4 – 49 (7,928,758)
